comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>The inline script userule suggested to me did work for windows adguard extension ||zoechip.com/|$inline-script,important

it however did not work on Adguard IOS

of which neither did this userule work on IOS either

||zoechip.com/|$csp=script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' http: https: data: blob: mediastream: filesystem:,important

So for windows the redirect is blocked for IOS its not

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/124982114/73ec7173-71b2-45ab-8304-e48e99d421ab)


</details>
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/124982114/1f82d7dd-ddd5-443b-8b4a-6059e62d4ea4)


<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>Also im trying to learn your adblock and the custom filters

So im gonna take a shot here would these filter rules of which right now are not put correctly therefore will not block

http://ads.example.org.us/ad1.gif
    http://example.com/redirect/http://ads.example.org/
    
    Would they block if they were typed this way instead?
    
    http://ads.example.org/us/ad1.gif
    http://example.com/http:ads.example.org/redirect
    
    or would it be http://ads.example.org/redirect?
    
    
    meaning there was never supposed to be a .com only a .org because in this example these are orginization websites?
    
    or is there an example.com commerical website and a example.org orginzation website
    
    of where if what i understand is correct the addresses of websites go first of http://example.com/http:ads.example.org/redirect?
    
    
    or would it actually be http://example.com/redirect
    
    and http://ads.example.org/redirect
    
    meaning they would be two seperate filter rules?



Im trying to understand this!


If im completely wrong on why these would not be blocked


than i dont comprehend your websites explanation on filter rules at all

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Hi!
The issue is caused by `xinggsf`. 
Please add 
```
ooigawa-gyokyo.or.jp#@#[class|=ad]
ooigawa-gyokyo.or.jp#@#[id|=ad]
``` 
to User rules, or turn-off this filter.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://store.admitad.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fstore.admitad.com) ### Comment > При включенном AdGuard на Mac отказывается открываться сайт admitad.com. Белый список (исключения) не помогает, приостановка защиты не помогает, я уже забодался искать проблему. Открыть admitad получается только в одном случае — если полностью закрыть приложение AdGuard через cmd Q, потом почистить куки адмитада и закрыть браузер через cmd Q. Помогите пожалуйста! > > macOS Monterey и macOS Ventura, глюк на обеих версиях ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.

comment.body:
> ### 问题网址（阻止不正确）
> [https://www.bilibili.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2F)
> 
> ### 评论
> 用户名：
> 
> > b站前六个视频有一个是广告，拦截插件拦截了此广告，结果b站从第七个视频开始margin-top=40px，其中一个视频（广告）被拦截了，第七个视频就顶上去了，于是这个视频就和前面的视频不对齐
> 
> ### 截图
> 截图 1
> 截图 2
> ### 系统配置
> 信息	价值
> 广告卫士产品：	广告卫士浏览器扩展 v4.1.57
> 浏览器：	边缘
> 隐身模式：	禁用
> 过滤 器：	广告拦截：广告卫士基本
> 
> 隐私：广告卫士跟踪保护
> 
> 特定语言：
> 
> 
> 广告卫士中文，
> 广告卫士西班牙语/葡萄牙语

补充：并不是每一次的前六个视频都有广告

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://store.admitad.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fstore.admitad.com) ### Comment > При включенном AdGuard на Mac отказывается открываться сайт admitad.com. Белый список (исключения) не помогает, приостановка защиты не помогает, я уже забодался искать проблему. issue.title: planningportal.co.uk

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.1.69.19

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://rail.planningportal.co.uk

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Collateral damage from this filter rule:

```
planningportal.co.uk##body:style(overflow: auto !important;)
```

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/a77fe12fcb152dea676b60dcc91d1ab448286809/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_specific.txt#L1167C1-L1167C26

Can you exclude subdomain `rail.planningportal.co.uk` from this filter rule please? The rule is currently indiscriminate, and breaks layout on that subdomain (which is completely different software, provided by a third-party). In particular, content is not positioned correctly, because `height` is intended to be `100%` rather than `auto`.

The original rule doesn't achieve its goal of blocking the cookie notice on the root domain, in any case - it's impossible to scroll down with the scroll wheel if the cookie notice hasn't been properly dismissed - I think there's some sort of `scroll` event listener on the root element.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Changed the rules, will be available with the new filter update in 1-2 hours

issue.title: planningportal.co.uk

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.1.69.19

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://rail.planningportal.co.uk

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Collateral damage from this filter rule:

```
planningportal.co.uk##body:style(overflow: auto !important;)
```

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/a77fe12fcb152dea676b60dcc91d1ab448286809/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_specific.txt#L1167C1-L1167C26

Can you exclude subdomain `rail.planningportal.co.uk` from this filter rule please? The rule is currently indiscriminate, and breaks layout on that subdomain (which is completely different software, provided by a third-party). In particular, content is not positioned correctly, because `height` is intended to be `100%` rather than `auto`.

The original rule doesn't achieve its goal of blocking the cookie notice on the root domain, in any case - it's impossible to scroll down with the scroll wheel if the cookie notice hasn't been properly dismissed - I think there's some sort of `scroll` event listener on the root element.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Cheers

comment.body:
It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please add this rule:
```adblock
hindustantimes.com#@$##header, .leftNav { position: static !important; animation: none !important; }
```
to user rules.

issue.title: hyros.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://hyros.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhyros.com) ### Comment Username: @manuelriveroit > I'm Manuel Rivero, the Tech Lead at Hyros, which is essentially a platform that allows users to visualize interactions between their customers and the Ads they’re running, providing them with a way of knowing exactly which of their Ads are the most performing. > > Since last week, our users started experiencing several issues with the application, and we found that it was because our hyros.com base domain had been added to the base filters list (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/master/filters/filter_2_Base/filter.txt). This has caused problems not only with our sales site (https://hyros.com), but also with our application (https://app.hyros.com). > > Since the main purpose of the AdGuard platform is blocking any type of tracking, it makes sense to evaluate blocking our scripts, but the blocking of the root domain is way to broad and is causing issues for users all across our domain. > > We have a domain dedicated to tracking, and we would like to request an update of the filter from hyros.com to tracking.hyros.com, so that we can make sure that our application and systems remain functional for users making use of AdGuard. > > Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any additional questions or need any other context. > > Regards, > > Manuel ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sq6hu49zl68sogkscowcsskscggok8ort4xvjmfwv4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kwu4jpwpfxck0w4s8oo4csgc0csg4gs7t5kb6lpd9g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

comment.body:
In fact, it's blocked by EasyList, but the rule has been changed.
So, it's fixed and the update should be available in 2-3 hours.

> We have a domain dedicated to tracking, and we would like to request an update of the filter from hyros.com to tracking.hyros.com, so that we can make sure that our application and systems remain functional for users making use of AdGuard.

Thanks, we have it in AdGuard Tracking Protection.

issue.title: hyros.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://hyros.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhyros.com) ### Comment Username: @manuelriveroit > I'm Manuel Rivero, the Tech Lead at Hyros, which is essentially a platform that allows users to visualize interactions between their customers and the Ads they’re running, providing them with a way of knowing exactly which of their Ads are the most performing. > > Since last week, our users started experiencing several issues with the application, and we found that it was because our hyros.com base domain had been added to the base filters list (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersRegistry/master/filters/filter_2_Base/filter.txt). This has caused problems not only with our sales site (https://hyros.com), but also with our application (https://app.hyros.com). > > Since the main purpose of the AdGuard platform is blocking any type of tracking, it makes sense to evaluate blocking our scripts, but the blocking of the root domain is way to broad and is causing issues for users all across our domain. > > We have a domain dedicated to tracking, and we would like to request an update of the filter from hyros.com to tracking.hyros.com, so that we can make sure that our application and systems remain functional for users making use of AdGuard. > > Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any additional questions or need any other context. > > Regards, > > Manuel ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sq6hu49zl68sogkscowcsskscggok8ort4xvjmfwv4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kwu4jpwpfxck0w4s8oo4csgc0csg4gs7t5kb6lpd9g.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
> 그럼, 끄신 상태에서 AdGuard for Android -> 앱 관리 -> Opera -> `HTTPS 필터링`를 켬으로 하신 뒤에, 새로고침해보시겠어요?

@piquark6046 
해결 되었습니다.

혹시 카톡에서 수신은 메세지 이외의 파일들은 볼 수 없고, 발신은 아무것도 안되지만 애드가드를 끄거나, 껐다 키거나, 데이터를 사용한다면 전부 사용가능해지는 문제는 어떻게 해야 되는지 알 수 있을까요?
알람에서 바로 답장, 읽음 안됨, 채널 추가는 가능하지만 차단은 불가능 등도 발생합니다.
아니면 새로 오류를 보고할까요

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.drafthound.com/fpl

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

_No response_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

> 혹시 카톡을 와이파이 상황에서 사용할 때, 수신은 메세지 이외의 파일들은 볼 수 없고, 발신은 아무것도 안되지만 애드가드를 끄거나, 껐다 키거나, 데이터를 사용한다면 전부 사용가능해지는 문제는 어떻게 해야 되는지 알 수 있을까요?
알람에서 바로 답장, 읽음 안됨, 채널 추가는 가능하지만 차단은 불가능 등도 발생합니다.
아니면 새로 오류를 보고할까요

텍스트 메시지 제외한 모든 메시지요?
전 수신이 잘 됩니다. DNS 필터를 끄고 해보시겠어요? 전 DNS 필터를 끄고 씁니다.

issue.title: www.larousse.fr, No response when clicking after applying a filter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Browser Extension Firefox 1.51.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.larousse.fr

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, EasyList Italy, Liste AR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1.  #
2. I noticed one big problem after updating the filters. That annoying pay or consent banner was gone, but the problem was that most of the items on the site, with the exception of the few above, didn't respond when I clicked on them.
Current clickable items:
LANGUE FRANÇAISE
DICTIONNAIRES BILINGUES
TRADUCTEUR
CONJUGATEUR
ENCYCLOPÉDIE
CUISINE
FORUM
JEUX
LIVRES
Currently unclickable items: everything except the above.
e.g) Flag and language items in the centre of the website

Also, on the language-specific dictionary site, you can't enter text in an empty text box.
Also when I click the button nothing happens.

e.g) https://www.larousse.fr/dictionnaires/italien-francais
https://www.larousse.fr/dictionnaires/francais-arabe

3. Screenshots
<details><[summary]>Screenshot 1:</summary>
https://imgur.com/VXvlbeT
https://imgur.com/SYEKKYv

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
